title: Alzheimer’s funding boost for Open University scientist (Milton Keynes Chamber of Commerce Limited)
text: ( Source : Milton Keynes Chamber of Commerce Limited ) A leading dementia researcher based at The Open University has secured nearly £370k of funding from Alzheimer's Research UK for a pioneering new research project. Dr Cheryl Hawkes and her
